thread.title: Old Hotel in need of major upgrades
thread.title_full: Old Hotel in need of major upgrades - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: davidrM8237MU
title: Old Hotel in need of major upgrades
text: Front desk staff hit me with an extra $20/night mandatory fee for "Wi-Fi and 10% discount on dining in the hotel". Used neither. The heating system at the window made so much noise every time it came on that you had to chose between being able to sleep or being cold. A wicked draft came through the windows
